channel.title: 2020-06-05 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2020-06-05 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 05 Jun 2020 00:00
item.description:
Gloomy weather, impending rain and breezy forecast - Great way to kick off the weekend with a short hike. Meena didn’t get to see the falls last time we were on this trail. So we decided to head back here with Shasta in the carrier. Made it back home just in time before the thunder-storms kicked in.

[gallery size=“large” ids=“8376,8377,8375,8371,8372,8373,8374”]
item.content:encoded:
Gloomy weather, impending rain and breezy forecast - Great way to kick off the weekend with a short hike. Meena didn’t get to see the falls last time we were on this trail. So we decided to head back here with Shasta in the carrier. Made it back home just in time before the thunder-storms kicked in.

[gallery size=“large” ids=“8376,8377,8375,8371,8372,8373,8374”]
